summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Southwest Webster Street from 24th Ave. Southwest to 28th Ave. Southwest; and certain other streets, avenues, alley and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with the Resolution No. 18798 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
